Contact: https://github.com/yaghiashraf/compliance-starter-pack/security
Expires: 2025-12-31T23:59:59.000Z
Encryption: https://complianceservice.solutions/.well-known/pgp-key.txt
Acknowledgments: https://complianceservice.solutions/security-acknowledgments
Preferred-Languages: en
Canonical: https://complianceservice.solutions/.well-known/security.txt
Policy: https://complianceservice.solutions/security-policy

# Security Policy for Compliance Service Solutions
# 
# We take security seriously and welcome security research.
# Please report vulnerabilities responsibly.
#
# Scope: This security policy applies to:
# - https://complianceservice.solutions
# - Client-side code vulnerabilities
# - Infrastructure security issues
#
# Out of scope:
# - Social engineering attacks
# - Physical security
# - Third-party dependencies (report directly to vendors)
#
# Please do not:
# - Access or modify user data
# - Perform denial of service attacks
# - Spam or phishing
#
# Response timeline:
# - Initial response: 48 hours
# - Triage: 5 business days
# - Resolution: 30 business days (complex issues may take longer)
#
# Thank you for helping keep our users safe!
